name: The Graph
description: The Graph is an indexing protocol for querying networks like Ethereum and IPFS. Anyone can build and publish open APIs, called subgraphs, making data easily accessible.

tasks.name: Create a Web3 wallet
tasks.description: Visit https://ethereum.org/wallets and install a wallet to start your journey.

tasks.name: $GRT token
tasks.description: Buy and hold any amount of $GRT tokens in your wallet.

tasks.name: Indexer
tasks.description: Operate a node to index data and serve queries https://thegraph.com/docs/indexing

tasks.name: Curator
tasks.description: Organize data by signaling on subgraphs https://thegraph.com/docs/curating

tasks.name: Delegator
tasks.description: Secure the network by delegating GRT to Indexers https://thegraph.com/docs/delegating
